modName: Less Volume for Musket Mod by Ghosu
summary: The musket sound from the amazing mod made by ghosu had a very high volume for my taste. heres with less volume in case you dont want to get deaf.
descriptionHtml:
MUSKET LESS VOLUME v2.0

The musket sound from the amazing mod made by ghosu had a very high volume for my taste. heres with less volume in case you dont want to get deaf.

IMPORTANT:

THIS IS MADE FOR PEOPLE THAT CANT HANDLE VERY LOUD SOUNDS AND/OR WANT TO PLAY AT NIGHT WITHOUT WAKING UP YOUR PARENTS.
I KNOW THE MUSKETS MADE A LOT OF SOUND IN REAL LIFE, BUT AS STATED BEFORE, THIS IS FOR THE EAR SENSITIVE.

Changes:

I only reduced 13.0 dB to the original sound files.

THANKS. :)

Now musket less volume VERSION 2.0
compatible with alpha version 2.0 from ghosu. thanks mate, you rock.

Remember you need this mod:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23903

Overwrite when asked.
Always keep a backup of your files if you dont like it.

Regards.

polluxval.

----------

IMPORTANT:

ALL CREDITS TO THE AMAZING JOB FROM:

ghosu

Original mod:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23903
author: polluxval
